issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Error updating scaling activity while setting services.imaging.worker.configured to false

comments.body:
Fix Verified.

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.1.1
Release     : 0.0.23137.50.20150326gitf965d79.el6

No errors, scaling activity or otherwise, observed in cloud-output log when imaging worker configured property set to false.

{code}
[root@g-12-02 ~]# euca-describe-instances i-46e54df3
RESERVATION	r-c02c7cbd	706589908340	euca-internal-imaging-worker-01
INSTANCE	i-46e54df3	emi-ee623101	10.116.153.97	172.31.3.158	running	adminkey	0		m1.small	2015-03-27T23:43:14.003Z	one				monitoring-enabled	10.116.153.97	172.31.3.158	vpc-9fdeca1f	subnet-2bdc6050	instance-store					hvm		f425b86c-036d-4dbf-8d22-cf4fbe93ecfd_one_1	sg-29fcfba6			arn:aws:iam::706589908340:instance-profile/internal/imaging/imaging-worker-01	x86_64
NETWORKINTERFACE	eni-f16d6f14	subnet-2bdc6050	vpc-9fdeca1f	706589908340	in-use	172.31.3.158	euca-172-31-3-158.eucalyptus.internal	true
ATTACHMENT		0	attached	2015-03-27T23:43:14.006Z	true
ASSOCIATION	10.116.153.97	eucalyptus	172.31.3.158
PRIVATEIPADDRESS	172.31.3.158	euca-172-31-3-158.eucalyptus.internal	primary
TAG	instance	i-46e54df3	Name	euca-internal-imaging-workers
TAG	instance	i-46e54df3	aws:autoscaling:groupName	asg-euca-internal-imaging-worker-01
TAG	instance	i-46e54df3	euca:node	10.111.5.166

[root@g-12-02 ~]# euca-modify-property -pservices.imaging.worker.configured=false
PROPERTY	services.imaging.worker.configured	false was true
{code}
